cyclone.name: JOSE
cyclone.current_location: about 1505 miles east of the Lesser Antilles
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the central Atlantic toward the northern Leeward Islands

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands and nearby northeast Caribbean waters
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤9%) of experiencing sustained 34-kt (39-mph) winds late this weekend; otherwise gentle to moderate trade winds continue.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for St. Croix based on current track well to the east–northeast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Little to no significant rainfall forecast; any showers would be isolated and light.
